alert.note: Alert for Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 08 at 6:31PM EDT until August 09 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Swift River At Roxbury affecting Oxford County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Swift River at Roxbury. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.8 feet. - The river rises out of banks at 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM EDT Tuesday was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 3.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
